job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout CarrotltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtCarrot Fertility is the leading global fertility benefits provider for employers built to make fertility care and familyforming affordable and accessible for everyone who wants or needs it Companies use Carrot to customize a fertility benefit that provides employees financial medical and emotional support as they pursue parenthood reducing healthcare costs and resulting in better clinical outcomesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe RoleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWere on the hunt for the next member of the Product Engineering Team Carrot is constantly working to improve on processes quality and techniques with the goal of producing the best product in the industry Every step towards our mission means more people forming the family they always wantedltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWere empowered to make local decisions reducing the overhead of getting things doneltligtltligtWe favor a Lean approach to our product development following the parts of agile that work best for usltligtltligtWe welcome new technologies and are constantly selfevaluating our toolsltligtltligtWe use weekly retrospectives and empowerment to help iterate on our team processesltligtltligtWe are a highly collaborative group promoting pair programming whenever possibleltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout YoultbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtYou have 2 years of experience of post grad software engineering experienceltligtltligtYou view software engineering as a craft and welcome the opportunity to share knowledge with fellow enthusiastsltligtltligtYou care deeply about building the best experience for our users and making an impact in their livesltligtltligtYou find learning new tech and patterns exciting and love experimentingltligtltligtYou understand the balancing game an engineer has to play weighing new feature development with technical debtltligtltligtA blank piece of paper doesnt scare you You are excited to design products from the ground upltligtltligtYou take pride in our mission fertility care for allltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtYou WillltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtImplement code throughout our tech stackltligtltligtHelp develop the direction of our productltligtltligtWork with teammates throughout Carrot in order to build the optimal productltligtltligtContribute to the big picture as well as make many inthemoment microdecisions in the best interest of our customersltligtltligtInfluence the engineering direction of CarrotltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtOur Tech StackltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCarrot is built mainly with React and NET Core Were interested in people from any background as long as you have a keen understanding of ObjectOriented languages and MVC experienceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhy CarrotltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtFounded in 2016 CB Insights recognized Carrot as one of the worlds most promising private digital health companies In 2020 Carrot was named to Fast Companys World Changing Ideas awards program which recognizes companies that are tackling societys biggest problems and Carrot was named to Fierce Healthcares Fierce 15 List of 2021 which recognizes the most promising healthcare companies in the industry Carrot supports 200 companies in more than 50 countries across North America Asia Europe South America and the Middle East
